name: FluidInteractionRegistry.InteractionInformation
description: Holds the interaction data for a given source type on when to succeed and what to perform.

fields.name: predicate
fields.description: The field for the predicate record component.

fields.name: interaction
fields.description: The field for the interaction record component.

constructors.name: InteractionInformation
constructors.description: Constructor which checks the surroundings fluids for a specific type and then transforms the source state into a block.

constructors.name: InteractionInformation

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) .

methods.name: predicate
methods.description: Returns the value of the predicate record component.

methods.name: interaction
methods.description: Returns the value of the interaction record component.
